title: 'SportsCenter' host Elle Duncan leaves ESPN for Netflix - Los Angeles Times
classification_notes: Content, Deals & Distribution -> Sports -> General News & Strategy

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> Sports -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: Elle Duncan is leaving ESPN next year to become the lead and signature talent for Netflix Sports
summary_bullets: Elle Duncan is leaving ESPN next year to become the lead and signature talent for Netflix Sports

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> Sports -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: Netflix announced Duncan will make her debut hosting Skyscraper Live, which follows Alex Honnold’s attempt to free solo Taipei 101
summary_bullets: Netflix announced Duncan will make her debut hosting Skyscraper Live, which follows Alex Honnold’s attempt to free solo Taipei 101

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> Sports -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: Duncan, 42, had her final SportsCenter appearance Wednesday and previously appeared on WNBA Countdown and College GameDay after joining ESPN in 2016
summary_bullets: Duncan, 42, had her final SportsCenter appearance Wednesday and previously appeared on WNBA Countdown and College GameDay after joining ESPN in 2016

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> Sports -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: Netflix vice president for sports Gabe Spitzer said Duncan’s mix of hard-hitting analysis and personality-driven hosting immediately adds credibility and familiar star power to the streamer’s global slate
summary_bullets: Netflix vice president for sports Gabe Spitzer said Duncan’s mix of hard-hitting analysis and personality-driven hosting immediately adds credibility and familiar star power to the streamer’s global slate

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> Sports -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: Netflix has been expanding its live sports portfolio, including a new Major League Baseball deal covering the season opener, Home Run Derby, and Field of Dreams game for the next three years
summary_bullets: Netflix has been expanding its live sports portfolio, including a new Major League Baseball deal covering the season opener, Home Run Derby, and Field of Dreams game for the next three years

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> Sports -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: The streamer also holds an NFL Christmas Day doubleheader and has carried high-profile boxing events such as Canelo Alvarez vs. Terence Crawford
summary_bullets: The streamer also holds an NFL Christmas Day doubleheader and has carried high-profile boxing events such as Canelo Alvarez vs. Terence Crawford

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> Sports -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: Netflix will become the exclusive video home for Barstool Sports podcasts, with video versions of Pardon My Take, The Ryen Russillo Podcast, and Spittin’ Chiclets streaming starting next year
summary_bullets: Netflix will become the exclusive video home for Barstool Sports podcasts, with video versions of Pardon My Take, The Ryen Russillo Podcast, and Spittin’ Chiclets streaming starting next year

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> Sports -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: Duncan’s move signals Netflix’s strategy to pair prominent on-air talent with its growing live sports and sports-adjacent content to help mainstream sports viewers transition to streaming
summary_bullets: Duncan’s move signals Netflix’s strategy to pair prominent on-air talent with its growing live sports and sports-adjacent content to help mainstream sports viewers transition to streaming

title: Miranda Lambert TV Series From Hulu, Sony Pictures Television In Works

facts.content_line: Unt. Miranda Lambert/Judalina Neira: Hulu, Sony Pictures Television, drama (12/18)
summary_bullets: Unt. Miranda Lambert/Judalina Neira: Hulu, Sony Pictures Television, drama (12/18)

title: Miranda Lambert TV Series From Hulu, Sony Pictures Television In Works

facts.content_line: Unt. Miranda Lambert/Judalina Neira: Hulu, drama (12/18)
